name: CSV Ether Explorer
description:
Super Important Note F1 to help ingame

CSV Ether Explorer is a crafting like game, but instead of crafting tools and stuff, you "craft" combinations to use with your drone to defend yourself with different tools from waves of aliens. 
This project was made for the JAM Craft 5 https://itch.io/jam/jamcraft5, but unfortunaly I miss the deadline by some hours :/

It was my first gamejam and I hope you get half the fun I get developing it.

To you know, this game may be a LOT buggy, I have less than half the time I think I would have to build it, but it was some really fun hours doing so, oh and also You can resize the screen, but it's best if you not haha :/ didnt have time to fix that :/
